> Several hours later he landed 
> and entered the sophisticated and expans=
ie base, nearly settling in 
for 
> rest, when he recalled his cargo.  Desc=
ending to the medical wing, he

cted it to the life support

, to determine if there 
was

Weak with barely=
 a light eminated on it's own, barely an orb with life 
until it was hooked=
 up to some sort of support. 
It remained dim as though resting, as though =
gaining energy to restore 
itself. That tiny processor surrounded by the or=
b of light would remain 
silent and still... for now.
